segments.text: Good morning . Madam . What can I do for you today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hello . I hope you can help me ; I'm a little worried about my new card .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What seems to be the problem ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I received my new card this morning , but I'm unable to use it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh ? You mean , the ATM machine has eaten it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , it's right here , see ? The ATM will not accept it !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You said you received your card this morning , am I right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I was told it would be activated and ready to use right away . So , what's gone wrong ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Did you receive your PIN number yet , Madam ? You see , unless you have your new PIN number , to match your new card , you cannot use it . We usually send that separately , around one day after the card , for security reasons .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , that explains it . I've been using my old PIN number ! Thanks for explaining everything to me .
segments.speaker: S2
